31722.name: Amountify
31722.description:
A simple plugin to generate random currency amounts into Figma.


Perfect for designers that are working on financial products, e.g. transaction lists.


  • Pound, Dollar and Euro supported
  • Ability to hide currency symbols
  • Ability to hide decimals
  • All ranges of sizes


Made by Kish Patel

32181.name: Content Master
32181.description:
Design more efficiently with data by searching for text content in your selection and generating real data into your text layers easily. Content master lets you find all instances of a text and replace them with data.


Features:


Find text content in the selection

Content Master will search through your selection and find all unique pieces of text content. It will then display these in a searchable list, allowing you to select and replace multiple items at once.


Replace content with data

Replace the selected text layers with real data like name, email address, physical address, company name, date, and lorem ipsum.


Create custom content with variables

Use static strings and dynamic data variables to create the content you need.


How to use

  1. Select layers in Figma
  2. Launch Content master
  3. Select text content in the searchable list
  4. Use quick replace cards or type text with variables in the Custom text field
  5. Optionally change variables settings below the variables buttons
  6. Hit Replace


To refresh the searchable list just select layers in Figma and hit Reload.

31769.name: Wordsvil - The Text Management System
31769.description:
Wordsvil.com is made to help you and your team to organize, translate and update all text in your app and across different departments. Keep everyone on the same page.


  • Upload your text file (.csv, .json), or create it directly from your Figma file
  • Invite team members to join you in Figma or on the webapp to work with you
  • Update and sync your files through the plugin or webapp, add new languages, ensure everyone is on the same page. 
  • Export for end-products in .csv and .json. (directly API coming soon) 


How it works: 

Wordsvil.com connects your Figma text objects with your apps text files. The Figma object name will be synced with the text keys, to keep both text values the same.


  • Install the plugin, or log into the website and set up an account
  • Add a new project and use â€œfrom Figma pageâ€� if you want to start from your Figma files, or utilize the other option to start from scratch, from csv or json files. 
  • After the project is created, the plugin/webapp serves as the source of truth. 
  • Within the project, click on the menu and select Team to add collaborators to a project.


For csv follow this format. Example: 

key,notes,en,de 
welcome,,Welcome!,Willkommen!


For json follow this format. Example: 

{ "EN": { "welcome": "Welcome!",  â€œbuyâ€�: â€�Buy nowâ€� },
  "DE": { "welcome": "Willkommen!", â€œbuyâ€�: â€�Kauenâ€�  }}


keywords/tags

copy, content, text, strings, writing, localization, language, translation, words, sync, translate
31769.release_notes: 1.0.3 Fixed Plugin and Web records "Pull Latest" bug

30705.name: Display for role
30705.description:
A plugin that allows managing roles by show-hide function


Prerequisites:

  • Add _roles page to your Figma file
  • Add a list of nodes with the names of your roles on _roles page
  • Plugin will automatically find this list and you can apply them to elements you want
  • Select the parent frame or group and then select the role and click show

30528.name: Lingohub
30528.description:
All your texts in one place - Localize your Figma projects with Lingohub!

 

With Lingohub you localize your projects in no time! Whether they are web or mobile apps, games, or websites. We provide you with continuous translation management and a workflow that is smoothly integrated into your product development process.

 

With our Figma plugin you can easily push your text segments straight from Figma to Lingohub. After your translation has been completed, simply pull the texts directly from Lingohub. Just like that you can view your localized design in Figma.

 

Your translators have an added benefit too, as they are able to check the context of each text segment while translating. Screenshots of your design are automatically uploaded to Lingohub. The days of manually uploading screenshots are over.

 

What can you do with Lingohub?

  • Push and pull your text segments directly from Figma to Lingohub and vice-versa.
  • Different teams working together on localization.
  • Automate your software localization.
  • Translate with our powerful editor.
  • A translation tool you can depend on: term base, translation memory, quality checks, ...

 

For more information on how to use our Figma plugin, visit our Help Center article https://help.lingohub.com/en/.

 

To use the Figma plugin a paid account is required. We provide you with a 14-day free trial where all features are available for you to try. If you need help, feel free to contact our https://lingohub.com/support at any time. Or schedule a free https://lingohub.com/demo and learn all about Lingohub.

32116.name: Color Space: First plugin with HCT
32116.description:
First Figma plugin with HCT and more about HCL / HSL / HSB .

( About HCT : https://material.io/blog/science-of-color-design )


Any questions or suggestions, contact me: nowork.app@gmail.com

30823.name: Crylic
30823.description:
Integrate Crylic with Figma!


This plugin supports importing elements exported through Crylic.

Learn more at https://docs.crylic.io/workflows/exporting-to-figma

32023.name: Anno-tation
32023.description:
Create simple annotation for your design document.

---

Usage


Remark

  1. Select a layer (single only)
  2. Pick a color for the badge
  3. Click 'Create' and you'll get a badge with index, and a card for writing down annotation.
  4. If you delete a badge&card, click 'Refresh' to update indexes

Notes:

  1. The index will continue to increase.
  2. If you want to change index, just edit it in the badge manually (the card related will be auto-updated because it uses an instance of the badge).
  3. If you need to delete a remark, delete badge and related card together.


Title

  1. Select a layer (single only , and must be the direct child of page)
  2. Choose a state
  3. Click 'Create' to create a title with status above your selection

---

It's created for my personal use, but I think maybe, probably, perhaps, it can also be used by others :D

Hope some of you will find it useful, and comments & suggestions are always welcomed!

31367.name: Figma To Stitches
31367.description:
Unofficial Stitches Plugin that converts Figma styles to Stitches config


Forked from Figma to Tailwind plugin https://github.com/jan-dh/figma-tailwindcss
